name: Just eat just enough 2
description:
Game Made for Ludum Dare 43, theme: "Sacrifices must be made".

Description

* kill fish to score points
* fish drop food
* eat food to regain health
* shoot cost health (see? you sacrifice your health!!)
* the less health you have, slower you are(you even sacrifice your speed!!).
* if the health is low it will regenerate (just enough for one shoot).

Controls:

* WASD to move
* Mouse to Aim
* Left mouse button to shoot
